title: This Committee may be called “Tourism Development Area Committee” (TDAC)
clause_text: This Committee may be called “Tourism Development Area Committee” (TDAC). The persons at 5, 6& 7 of the Committee may be nominated by Secretary, Tourism Department and the tenure of these members shall change after every 3 years, provided that the same person shall be eligible for reappointment as a Member. Maximum area permissible as TDA out of a holding in SDZ shall be as follows:-
